oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General George W. Gordon and Staff at Confederate Reunion in Franklin

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Reunions
United Confederate Veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: General George W. Gordon and Staff at a Confederate Reunion in Franklin. The individuals in the photograph are identified as Dr. Powell (Union City), Dr. Deering J. Roberts (Nashville), Col. Jno. P. Hickman (Nashville), Gen. J. H. McDowell (Union City),; Gen. Geo. W. Gordon (Memphis), and Maj. C. A. Goodloe (Alamo).
